values.name: Ascending Thin Limb Cell
values.label: kidney loop of Henle thin ascending limb epithelial cell

references.notes: AQP1 low to none, also HUBMAP unpublished

GATA3 may be in subpopulation of DCT, CNT and vSMC/P. SLC8A1, CALB1, TRPV5 (low to none); Low to No CALCA and KIT in C-CD-IC-A. It may not be possible to assign IC or PC to CNT or CD structures without regional information of their source.
